response.explain: The previous action code has successfully turned on the toaster. Now, we need to wait for the bread slice to be cooked.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the bottom cabinet.
(2) Grasp a bread slice from the bottom cabinet.
(3) Move to the toaster.
(4) Grasp a bread slice.
(5) Move to the toaster.
(6) Put the bread slice in the toaster.
(7) Move closer to the toaster.
(8) Turn on the toaster.
(9) Wait for the bread slice to be cooked.
